attributes.action: Stop wasting tax payers money on having a petitions website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop wasting taxpayers money and peoples time on pointless petitions that have no impact. 

The time wasted to British industry and daily life could be used for other more meaningful pastimes.

rejection.details:
We do not accept petitions against petitions or use of this site.

Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.

Thank you.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
